# CoreSpotlightActionSymbolImage

**Property List Key**

The name of a SF Symbol to display next to the action’s title.

## Action Properties

- **CoreSpotlightActionTitle**: The user-visible string that Spotlight displays as the title of the action.
- **CoreSpotlightActionIdentifier**: A string an app defines to identify the action.
